content: i ve named this blanket the in fours blanket as i found myself counting to 4 whilst knitting it to remind myself of where i was in the pattern repeat so it felt the obvious choice when it came to naming i don t claim to have created anything particularly unique but it s a blanket that i really enjoyed knitting and i m excited to share it with you all i have listed the guage for the yarn used but guage is not important for this blanket there is a link to a video tutorial within the pattern
